Unleash the power of the Lightning Blade with this incredible, action-packed figure of the legendary Copy Ninja, Kakashi Hatake, from Naruto: Shippuden.
Standing at an impressive 20 cm, this dynamic figure captures Kakashi in a powerful mid-air lunge as he prepares to strike with his signature jutsu. The sculpt is filled with motion, from the flow of his Konoha flak jacket to the intensity in his visible eye. The highlight of the piece is the stunning translucent blue effect part, masterfully recreating the crackling energy of his Chidori.
Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this figure is a perfect tribute to one of the series' most beloved characters. It comes with a specially designed stand to hold Kakashi in his gravity-defying pose, making it a standout centerpiece in any collection.

Bring the formidable King of Curses to your collection with this captivating 14cm chibi figure of Ryomen Sukuna! This unique statue captures the powerful antagonist from Jujutsu Kaisen in a stylized, compact form, but with all of his menacing presence.
The figure showcases a miniaturized Sukuna with his signature pink spiky hair, facial markings, and multiple eyes, all meticulously detailed. He is depicted in a squatting pose, resting on a small, dark base with a skull to the side, adding to his eerie and dominant aura. This chibi-style collectible is an excellent way to celebrate one of the most powerful and iconic characters from the series.
Key Features:
* Stylized Chibi Design: A fun and unique take on Sukuna that maintains his intense and intimidating look.
* Intricate Facial Details: Despite the size, the figure perfectly captures Sukuna's distinct markings, multiple eyes, and piercing gaze.
* Compact & Powerful: At 14cm, it's the perfect size for display on desks, shelves, or in a collection case, with a powerful presence that commands attention.
* Durable Construction: Made from high-quality PVC, ensuring a long-lasting and detailed finish.
* Essential Collector's Piece: A must-have for any Jujutsu Kaisen fan, this figure is a great way to showcase your love for the series' most iconic villain.
Add the King of Curses to your home and let his reign begin. This Sukuna figure is the perfect gift for a fellow fan or a fantastic addition to your own anime collection!
